text: Georges Lautner (24 January 1926 - 22 November 2013) was a French movie director and screenwriter. He is known for directing the famous French movie Les Tontons flingueurs. Lautner was born in Nice, France on 24 January 1926. He died on 22 November 2013 in Paris, France from a long illness, aged 87.Georges Lautner, le r√©alisateur des 'Tontons Flingueurs', est mort ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Nice Category:Disease-related deaths in France Category:French movie actors Category:French movie directors Category:French movie producers Category:French screenwriters Category:Writers from Nice
title: Georges Lautner
